    • Method Detail

      • saveServiceReference

        javax.management.ObjectName saveServiceReference(java.lang.String serviceInterfaceName,
                                               java.lang.String refName,
                                               javax.management.ObjectName moduleON)
                                                 throws javax.management.InstanceNotFoundException
        Create or update reference name to objectName. Reference name is unique per service interface name.
        Returns:
        created or updated object name containing service name and reference name
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is a mismatch between serviceInterfaceName and objectName
        javax.management.InstanceNotFoundException - if search did not find exactly one instance

                          java.lang.String refName)
                            throws javax.management.InstanceNotFoundException
        Remove service reference.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if service interface name is not advertised by any module

      • removeServiceReferences

        boolean removeServiceReferences(javax.management.ObjectName objectName)
                                throws javax.management.InstanceNotFoundException
        Remove all service references attached to given module.
        Returns:
        true iif at least one reference was removed
        Throws:
        javax.management.InstanceNotFoundException
